title: Extended metrics
description:
Collects extended metrics to push to InfluxDB or expose them in the /__stats/ endpoint.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/extended-metrics/

collection_time.title: Collection time
collection_time.description:
The time window to collect metrics

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/extended-metrics/

proxy_disabled.title: Proxy disabled
proxy_disabled.description:
Skip any metrics happening in the proxy layer (traffic against your backends).

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/extended-metrics/

router_disabled.title: Router disabled
router_disabled.description:
Skip any metrics happening in the router layer (activity in KrakenD endpoints).

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/extended-metrics/

backend_disabled.title: Backend disabled
backend_disabled.description:
Skip any metrics happening in the backend layer.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/extended-metrics/

endpoint_disabled.title: Endpoint disabled
endpoint_disabled.description:
When true do not publish the /__stats/ endpoint. Metrics won't be accessible via the endpoint but still collected.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/extended-metrics/

listen_address.title: Listen address
listen_address.description:
Change the listening address where the metrics endpoint is exposed.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/extended-metrics/
